mapper.select: select u_stu_no as no, u_stu_addr1 as addr1, u_stu_email as email, u_stu_grade as grade, u_stu_ssn as ssn, u_stu_enterdate as enterDate, u_stu_leavedate as leaveDate, u_stu_parentname as parentName, u_stu_professor as professor, u_stu_parentphone as parentPhone, u_stu_addr2 as addr2, u_stu_id as id, u_stu_remainleave as remainLeave, u_stu_name as name, u_stu_gender as gender, u_stu_division as division, u_stu_pwd as pwd, u_stu_register as register, u_stu_score as score, u_stu_phone as phone from u_student where u_stu_name = #{stuName}
select t_no as no, t_code as code, t_name as name, t_precode as precode from t_sitemap where t_name like '%' || #{divisionName} || '%' and t_precode is not null

select u_stu_no as no, u_stu_addr1 as addr1, u_stu_email as email, u_stu_grade as grade, u_stu_ssn as ssn, u_stu_enterdate as enterDate, u_stu_leavedate as leaveDate, u_stu_parentname as parentName, u_stu_professor as professor, u_stu_parentphone as parentPhone, u_stu_addr2 as addr2, u_stu_id as id, u_stu_remainleave as remainLeave, u_stu_maxonescore as maxOneScore, u_stu_nowscore as nowScore, u_stu_name as name, u_stu_gender as gender, u_stu_division as division, u_stu_pwd as pwd, u_stu_register as register, u_stu_score as score, u_stu_phone as phone from u_student where u_stu_division = #{code}

select j_no as no, j_limit_stu as limitStu, j_subject_name as subjectName, j_sub_prof as "professor.name", j_semester as "selectNo.no", j_grade as grade, j_is_passed as "passed.code", j_t_code as "siteCode.code", j_score as score, j_division as division from j_subject where j_subject_name like '%' || #{subjectName} || '%' order by j_t_code asc

select r.r_regi_no as regiNo, r.j_no as jno, r.u_stu_no as stuNo, r.e_no as eno, j_limit_stu as limitStu, j_subject_name as subjectName, j_sub_prof as "professor.name", j_semester as "selectNo.no", j_grade as grade, j_is_passed as "passed.code", j_t_code as "siteCode.code", j_score as score, j_division as division, s1.u_stu_name as stuName, s1.u_stu_id as stuId from r_regisubject r, j_subject s, u_student s1 where r.j_no = #{subjectNo} and r.j_no = s.j_no and s1.u_stu_no = r.u_stu_no
mapper.insert: insert into p_message (p_no, p_title, p_writer, p_writername, p_receiver, p_filename, p_contents, p_sendtime) values (p_message_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{writer}, #{writerName}, #{receiver}, #{filename}, #{contents}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update p_message set p_isdeletedbysender = 'Y' where p_no = #{dno}
mapper.select: select p_no as no, p_title as title, p_writer as writer, p_writername as writerName, p_receiver as receiver, p_contents as contents, p_ischeck as isCheck, p_filename as filename, p_sendtime as sendTime, p_checktime as checkTime, p_isdeletedbysender as isDeletedBySender, p_isdeletedbyreceiver as isDeleteByReceiver from p_message where p_writer = #{writer} and p_isdeletedbysender != 'Y' order by p_sendtime desc
select p_filename from p_message where p_no = #{no}
